oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Total Synthesis of (+)-Demethoxycardinalin 3
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: FERNANDES, RA
MULAY, SV
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: pictet-spengler cyclization
pyranonaphthoquinone antibiotics
asymmetric dihydroxylation
dermocybe cardinalis
crisamicin-a
micromonospora
(+)-kalafungin
derivatives
annulation
complexes
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The total synthesis of (+)-demethoxycardmalm 3 is described The synthetic strategy features the synthesis of dimerie Fischer carbene and us use in a biduectional Doi/ benzamulation reaction to set the dimerie structure of the cardmalms. The oxa-picict-Spengler reaction was used to construct the pyran rings The synthesis as completed in seven steps and an overall yield of 7%
